import React, { useState } from "react"; import { resumeUpdater } from "../../utils"; const Education = (...props) => { const { resume, setResume } = props[0]; const [formCount, setFormCount] = useState(2); const changeResumeInfo = (page, key, value) => { resumeUpdater(resume, setResume, page, key, value); }; const addAnotherForm = () => { setFormCount((preVal) => preVal + 1); }; return (
{Array.from(Array(formCount).keys()).map((el) => { console.log("hello"); if (el + 1 < formCount) { return (
changeResumeInfo("education", "school", e.target.value) } required >
changeResumeInfo("education", "degree", e.target.value) } required >
changeResumeInfo( "education", "school_city", e.target.value ) } required >
changeResumeInfo( "education", "education_start_date", e.target.value ) } required >
changeResumeInfo( "education", "education_end_date", e.target.value ) } required >
); } })}
+
); }; export default Education;
